long_description: The original Aerobie(R) flying ring, the Pro holds a world record for the farthest throw--an incredible 1,333 feet! Play an exhilarating game of catch with a friend more than 100 yards away. Soft rubber edge makes catching soft and easy. Recommended for kids 12 years old and up. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The original Aerobie(R) flying ring, the Pro holds a world record for the farthest throw--an incredible 1,333 feet!
